title: Ratham Creek
description: Unexpectedly widowed, Arianne Hollis retreats to a remote area of Montana where she is sucked into a feud between old families and newcomers. A member of the clannish mountain people wins her love, but she is torn between him and his family's escalating violence to protect their way of life. Then she becomes a target. Will Arianne give into the same vengeance that corrupts the clan?
author: Marie F. Martin
